input_text:
Job Title: Cyber Security Intern to Permanent

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Finance, Information Technology

Description:
Cyber Intern Job Description
At Optima we are looking for an aspiring security superstar! The overall goal of this role will be to learn the ins and outs of cybersecurity and risk management. Your overall focus will be to interact with clients on a variety of different security matters. You will be both eager to learn about the technical aspect of cybersecurity along with the business aspect.
As an intern you will get constant mentoring and development with the end goal of becoming a team member. You will help our clients fully understand the ins and outs of cyber in a language they understand, jargon need not apply here!
Who are you: You are a go-getter and you love and breath everything cyber! You are not afraid of presenting to clients on a topic because you know the preparation you've done pays off. You are capable understanding complex topics and translating them into language that people can understand and action on. Whenever you are writing, people compare your work to the likes of shakes.
Autonomy is your middle name and accountability is your first, you just get things done with no supervision. In the same breath you are not afraid to ask the questions that you are unable to find on google or just too complex to understand.
As an intern at Optima, you will have the opportunity to work with experienced cybersecurity professionals and learn from their expertise. You will be involved in a variety of projects and tasks, including interacting with clients, assisting with risk management and security assessments, and developing your technical and business knowledge.
Your ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and effectively will be a key part of this role, as you will be working with clients who may not have a deep understanding of cybersecurity. You will need to be able to explain technical concepts in a way that is easy for clients to understand and help them make informed decisions about their security posture.
You will be given a high level of autonomy in this role and will be expected to take ownership of your work and manage your own time effectively. You will need to be able to work independently and seek out guidance and support when needed. You will also be accountable for the quality of your work and the results you achieve.
Overall, this is a fantastic opportunity for an aspiring security superstar to learn and grow in a dynamic and challenging environment. If you are passionate about cybersecurity and eager to learn and contribute, we encourage you to apply for this internship at Optima.

Requirements for Success:Eager to learnSelf-starter you figure things out and know when you need helpAbility to type quickly and interact with the client during callsAbility to self-manage and get their tasks accomplishedBachelors degree helps but not requiredCertifications are helpful but not required

**Must be able to commute to New York City for Hybrid in-office Schedule** **Must be available immediately for full time work**
Please attach a resume for consideration.

Experience Level (if available): Internship

output_json.title: Cyber Security Intern to Permanent
output_json.summary: Optima seeks a Cyber Security Intern to learn cybersecurity and risk management, interact with clients, and assist with various security matters.
job_responsibilities: Interact with clients on security matters

other.content: Eager to learn, Self-starter, you figure things out and know when you need help, Ability to type quickly and interact with the client during calls, Ability to self-manage and get their tasks accomplished, Bachelors degree helps but not required, Certifications are helpful but not required
